name: PANCAR - Kenney Jam 2021
description:
Welcome to PANCAR™ the premier breakfast racing league!

Put your culinary cruising skills to the test and see how many laps you can complete without ruining your breakfast. 

How to play

  • Press the number keys (1, 2, 3, 4) on your keyboard in order, to jump.
  • Time your jump just right to leap over the bacon strips. 

Made in 48 hours by me, for the Kenney Jam 2021. The theme was 'Rotation'.
I interpreted 'rotation' as a sequence, you have to 'rotate' through the sequence in order to jump over the bacon and succesfully complete a lap/rotation around the pan.
